November 17, 2016Marat I. Latypov

My talk on quantification of EBSD datasets

I recently presented our work on Chord Length Distribution for quantification of microstructures at EMI-2016 conference held in Metz. The slides are now available online here. Push ‘F’ for full screen mode and use ← and → arrows for navigation. Let me know if you have any questions or comments.
